Good characters, interesting story, levels that are challenging but not overly difficult. The co-op mode is also very fun and I have played it several times and still found it enjoyable every time.
Complex level design that flows flawlessly with the humorous story.
Petition to have GLaDOS as the voice of the first fully sentient artificial intelligence.

Portal 2 es de los mejores juegos de puzzles que he jugado, niveles bien trabajados y complejos en su sencillez, mezcla a la perfección momentos en que se desarrolla la historia y los personajes con momentos donde resolver acertijos, su apartado gráfico ha envejecido excelentemente bien, su banda sonora espectacular y una inmersión que pocos juegos logran, es algo corto pero si consideramos su precio actual es un 10/10. Recomendado totalmente.

Highly Recommended, best 5 bucks you'll ever spend. I only knew the story because of Youtubers playing Portal Games but playing them myself it really got me inmersed into the Portal Universe. 10/10 and it runs on everything too, so don't worry if you don't have a gpu and only integrated graphics. it will run very well.

love this game so much !!!!!!! the concept is so cool, the comedy still makes me laugh even though ive played through it like 10 times now. the puzzles made me think so hard the first time and now the satisfaction from completing them is still there. amazing game !! stick around for the ending song cos thats true artistry :)

еб твою мать, на чё жмал?

当年玩传送门1时接触steam还没多长时间，那时感受到了太多惊喜，留下了很多乐趣和美好回忆。而传送门2在1的基础上做到了超越，带来的是更加出色的关卡设计和更加优秀的游戏体验。总体来说个人感觉难度比1要高不少但乐趣更多，双人挑战很烧脑。
10/10

Un juego que tiene buen envejecer.

Lástima de que no existan más secuelas.
Amazing game one of the best ever made

어릴 때 엄청 유명한 게임이었는데 드디어 해봄. 엔딩보고도 계속 생각남. 플레이할 때는 음 재밌다~ 정도였는데 끝나니 감자도스 계속 생각나고 여운 장난아님. 분위기랑 ai들 목소리 연기가 한몫함. 아포칼립스 분위기 참 좋아하는데 환장함. 혼자남은 인간과 날 죽이려드는 두 ai들. 무섭고 쓸쓸하기 짝이 없음. 근데 ai들이 참 재밌음. 바보 휘틀리랑 츤데레 글라도스 둘다 너무 귀여움. 목소리도 죽임. 결론은 너무 좋은 게임임. 진짜진짜 좋은데 기운 없을 때 해서 공략 좀 보고 함. 여유로울 때 하면 머리 쓰면서 깼을텐데 기력딸려서 못하겠음. 나이 먹어서 그런가 이제는 퍼즐류랑 안 맞는 것같기도 함. 스팀 유저면 한번 쯤은 플레이하면 좋겠다. 후속작 만들어주면 좋겠는데 숫자 3을 모르는 회사라 내줄 지 의문임. 포탈건 갖고싶다.

[h1]추천[/h1]
재미가 있었다.
조금씩 어려운 퍼즐이 있긴 했는데 그래도 못할정도는 아니여서 괜찮았다.
Да, я вам всем рекемендуем эту игрулю, и ещё обновление до сих пор! и она все ровно, легендарная!
einfach super. Die Story, die Stimmen und die Grafik (obwohl das spiel schon sehr alt ist). Es ist einfach geil

This game builds upon the first game and exceeds it in almost every way. There's more story this time around and way more content. There's more puzzles and fun characters you get to meet with new and unique puzzle ideas from the first game. This game is a must play for people who played and enjoyed the first Portal and people who like puzzle games.
probably one of the best games i have played.
